refnamediv.refpurpose: Allows the position and velocity of a node in a scanned process to be read.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Allows the position and velocity of a node in a scanned process to be read.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: kpos, kvel scanmap iscan, kamp, kvamp [, iwhich]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iscan -- which scan process to read
iwhich (optional) -- which node to sense. The default is 0.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kamp -- amount to amplify the kpos value.
kvamp -- amount to amplify the kvel value.
The internal state of a node is read. This includes its position and velocity. They are amplified by the kamp and kvamp values.
